description:
A series of murders is being carried out by someone claiming to be Jack the Ripper. In response, a vigilante group of the town`s poor confronts Scotland Yard while http://anidb.net/ch109856 [William] and the real http://anidb.net/ch116685 [Jack] scramble to uncover the true culprit`s aims and foil their plans.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: ホワイトチャペルの亡霊 第二幕
